name: zipsuit
description: A skintight and snug body suit.  Mostly made from a transparent latex, it's designed to cover only risky places by a simple zipper.

name: SWUT power suit
description: The DoubleTech Power Suit, it's created with the aim to address the shortcomings of the original design, which is weight and poor mobility.  Just like the latex suit, it is skintight and offers maximum mobility, while being carefully designed to protect important body parts as much as possible.  However due to its rather erotic appearance it remained largely unpopular except for the most enthusiastic soldiers.

name: schoolgirl uniform
description: An upper garment with a peculiar collar and torso design.  It is popular worldwide from the late 19th century to the early 20th century, and is wildly spread in cosplay culture as well as being used as a uniform for female students in Japan.
